title: Cow Milk (1L)
description: Fresh farm cow milk, rich in protein and calcium. Ideal for daily use in tea, coffee, and drinking. Delivered hygienically in eco-friendly packs.

title: Buffalo Milk (1L)
description: Thick, creamy buffalo milk with higher fat content. Perfect for making curd, paneer, and ghee.

title: Goat Milk (1L)
description: Easily digestible goat milk, rich in minerals and vitamins. A healthier alternative for people with mild lactose intolerance.

title: Organic A2 Milk (1L)
description: Pure desi cow A2 milk from grass-fed cows. Boosts immunity, improves digestion, and is chemical-free.

title: Cheese (200g)
description: Soft and creamy cheese, made from fresh cow milk. Perfect for sandwiches, pizzas, and healthy snacking.

title: Curd (500g)
description: Rich, probiotic curd made from buffalo milk. Helps in digestion and keeps the gut healthy.

title: Paneer (200g)
description: Soft, fresh paneer cubes made from buffalo milk. Great source of protein for cooking curries and snacks.

title: Butter (200g)
description: Pure yellow butter churned from fresh cream. Adds richness to parathas, bread, and baking.

title: Ghee (500ml)
description: Traditional pure cow ghee with natural aroma. Perfect for cooking, pooja, and boosting immunity.

title: Flavored Milk (200ml)
description: Refreshing chilled flavored milk in chocolate, strawberry, and vanilla. A healthy alternative to soft drinks.

title: Yogurt (200g)
description: Thick and creamy yogurt, rich in probiotics. Keeps the stomach cool and improves digestion.

title: Ice Cream (500ml)
description: Delicious ice cream in multiple flavors like vanilla, chocolate, and mango. Made from pure milk without preservatives.
